testcase.name: test_create_duplicate_suite

failure.message:
AssertionError: Test: Duplicate suite creation Command: /opt/homebrew/anaconda3/bin/python -m mcp_manager.cli.main suite create test-duplicate-suite --description Duplicate suite Expected: Failure Actual: Success (returncode 0) Output: Creating suite 'test-duplicate-suite' with ID 'test-duplicate-suite'... ✅ Suite 'test-duplicate-suite' created successfully! Suite ID: test-duplicate-suite
#x1F4A1 Add servers to this suite with: mcp-ma

testcase.failure: tests/test_suite_management.py:85: in test_create_duplicate_suite TestAssertions.assert_command_failure(result2, "Duplicate suite creation") tests/utils/validators.py:248: in assert_command_failure raise AssertionError(error_msg) E AssertionError: E Test: Duplicate suite creation E Command: /opt/homebrew/anaconda3/bin/python -m mcp_manager.cli.main suite create test-duplicate-suite --description Duplicate suite E Expected: Failure E Actual: Success (returncode 0) E Output: Creating suite 'test-duplicate-suite' with ID 'test-duplicate-suite'... E ✅ Suite 'test-duplicate-suite' created successfully! E Suite ID: test-duplicate-suite E E #x1F4A1 Add servers to this suite with: E mcp-ma

testcase.name: test_create_suite_invalid_name

failure.message:
AssertionError: Test: Invalid suite name: Command: /opt/homebrew/anaconda3/bin/python -m mcp_manager.cli.main suite create --description Invalid name test Expected: Failure Actual: Success (returncode 0) Output: Creating suite '' with ID ''... ✅ Suite '' created successfully! Suite ID:
#x1F4A1 Add servers to this suite with: mcp-manager suite add <server-name> --role member --priority 50

E ✅ Suite '' created successfully! E Suite ID: E E #x1F4A1 Add servers to this suite with: E mcp-manager suite add <server-name> --role member --priority 50

testcase.name: test_add_server_to_nonexistent_suite

failure.message: AssertionError: Test: Add server to nonexistent suite Command: /opt/homebrew/anaconda3/bin/python -m mcp_manager.cli.main suite add nonexistent-suite test-server Expected: Failure Actual: Success (returncode 0) Output: Adding test-server to suite nonexistent-suite as member... ❌ Failed to add server to suite

E ❌ Failed to add server to suite

testcase.name: test_remove_server_from_nonexistent_suite

failure.message: AssertionError: Test: Remove server from nonexistent suite Command: /opt/homebrew/anaconda3/bin/python -m mcp_manager.cli.main suite remove nonexistent-suite test-server Expected: Failure Actual: Success (returncode 0) Output: Removing test-server from suite nonexistent-suite... ❌ Failed to remove server from suite

testcase.name: test_suite_installation_nonexistent_suite
